name: 視網膜脫落
content: 視網膜脫落 O A written consent is required Fasting 6-8 prior operation is required for general anaesthesia (Macula) NAM(Cornea) E * (Light) n m (Lens) Symptoms Most patients of primary retinal detachment suffer from only affected vision with no eye redness or pain. In the beginning they may see flashing light flying dots (floaters) and black shadows spreading from one corner to the centre. If the detachment occurs at the macula the central vision is affected with distortion of images. The extent of decrease of vision depends on the position of retinal detachment area affected duration and the clarity of vitreous. | 瑪麗醫院 Queen Mary Hospital (Pupil) (Anterior Chamber) (Vitreous) # # (Optic Nerve) LA (Irls) (Retina) 眼球縱切面图 BEE (UD) ENROOT Treatment The usual treatment for retinal detachment is surgery. The procedure includes a combination of cryotherapy laser therapy insertion of buckle and/or encircling band vitreous exchange with gases or silicon oil. The surgical aim is to reattach the retina in order to recover vision. The exact procedure varies with the conditions of patients. Sometimes a patient may need a second or a series of different surgical procedures. Post-operative care O In the early post-operative period the patient should follow the doctors instruction on bed rest in appropriate head/body posture O Patient should avoid bowing down tampering with the bandage or rubbing the operated eye In the recovery period besides taking the medication on time patients should also take easily digestable food with good nutritional value to enhance recovery Fruit and vegetables can prevent constipation O Alcohol and hard or spicy food should be avoided Beware of dirty water entering the eye while shampooing Strenuous exercise like diving and those with head shaking motions should be avoided O Attend follow up appointment as doctor advised A #-#2 AR RUE LIBEREA* ** P9 1 眼科臨床醫護的水平及效率為港岛市民提供是我現代 TERBARU 視網膜脫離 RUBENS IR NERNE + XIXTER-BAN # B R #NRARAH 亦負責策劃和推行區內眼科服務的長益發展並培訓眼 BXANA # RETINAL DETACHMENT Pre-operative preparation Patient should rest in appropriate posture as advised by eye doctor to prevent extension of the retinal break or detached area or formation of a new break which may increase difficulty of the operation or affect the progress of recovery Should you have any queries please consult your doctor during follow-up Quru Mary Hope Ownership Last review/revision Approval Distribution Pamphlet Topic & Department Code QMH/Eye-23 Mar/2012 HKWC Infomation Pamphlet Working Group As requested # ## Queen Mary Hospital Tel: 2255 3111 視網膜離 RETINAL DETACHMENT 手術後的護理和建議 ©請按醫生指示用適當身體姿勢休 息可減少視網膜的震盪 簡介 視膜網是眼球內部的一層薄膜感光 後將影像傳送到大腦使我們能看 見。視網膜內層之間存著潛在性間 隙當毛病出現時色素上皮層便很 容易和神經上皮層分開形成視網膜 脫離。視網膜脫離是一種嚴重的眼 疾必須及早治療。否則脫離的部份 便會因失去營養導致局部功能喪 失甚至完全失明。 病徵 眼睛不紅不痛只是視力突然受到影 響。開始時可能有閃光的感覺有如 雲霧遮擋(飛蚊或有游離黑影移動) 可能有黑影由某一方逐漸向中央移 動視力不全等。如果在黃斑區發生 脫離中心視力便嚴重下降物像甚 至變形。視力減退的程度視乎脫離 的部位、範圍、時間與及玻璃體混濁 程度等。 不宜彎腰拾物及操作 C切勿自行解開繃帶或揉擦手術後的 眼睛以免傷口發炎 依時服藥及使用眼藥 @進食營養豐富及容易消化的食物 C多吃水果和蔬菜以防便秘 Introduction Retina is a thin membrane at the back of the eye which receives light and sends messages to the brain making us see. Retinal detachment refers to the separation between the neural inner layer and pigmented outer layer of the retina. Owing to the presence of potential space between the layers of the retina problems can arise causing separation of the layers leading to retinal detachment. Retinal detachment is a serious disease which requires early treatment. If the condition is not treated early or is managed inappropriately the detached area would lose nutrients leading to loss of visual function or total blindness. 治療 一般採用手術治療。包括冷凝光凝 治療、鞏膜層填充或環繁、玻璃體交 換氣體或矽油術等。目的是封閉裂 孔使脫離的視網膜復位和恢復視 力。有時需要施行多次手術。 切勿飲酒及吃辛辣和堅硬食物 ●洗頭時小心避免污水流入眼內 避免做頭部震盪性的運動跳水和 潛水 按時覆診 視網膜脫样的成因 有原發性和繼發性兩類: (1) 原發性 原發性的視網膜脫離是指單純性視網 膜脫離發病與年齡、遺傳、近視、 玻璃體液化等因素有關。 (2) 繼發性 繼發性的視網膜脫離可能是由外傷、 眼內組織局部嚴重發炎、瘤腫、增殖 性視網膜病變(如糖尿眼) 等引起。然而 得到適當的調理脫離的視網膜多數 可以復位或病情受到控制。 The causes of retinal detachment Retinal detachment can be either primary or secondary. O Primary Primary retinal detachment refers to simple retinal detachment - the cause is related to age hereditary factors short-sightedness and the process of vitreous liquefaction Secondary Secondary retinal detachment can be caused by trauma severe inflammation inside the eye tumour or proliferative vitreoretinopathy (eg. Diabetic Retinopathy). When the cause is treated the detached retina can be reattached or disease progress controlled 手術前的準備 C充份臥床休息避免脫離部份或裂 孔擴大或引致其他裂孔的形成 需簽手術同意書 @如需全身麻醉需要禁食六至八小時 如有其他疑問可於覆診時向醫 生查詢
